overview: There's a special place just waiting for you to visit. Where cows, pigs and horses are your best friends. Where songs an stories are full of wonder. Where every day is an adventure. Where fun and learning never end. Where? It's New MacDonald's Farm.  Max and Milly and their farmyard friends enjoy a ride on Max's tractor trailer....everyone except on very special person...  Max's Tractor has 8 fun filled stories including The Train, Magical max, Roll Up! Roll Up!, Shirley's Sheep Show, Robot Max, The Tree House, Done with Dash and Wobbly Table.  Plus there are more great New MacDonald's Farm hit to sing: Max's Tractor, Hop, Skip and Jump, Our Tractor
title: New Macdonald's Farm - Max's Tractor
